hu.mgx.app.common

Interface AppInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConnectionHandlerInterface, ErrorHandlerInterface, FormatInterface, LanguageHandlerInterface, LoggerInterface, MessageHandlerInterface, PermissionInterface, VersionInterface
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConsoleAppInterface, SwingAppInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleApp, SwingApp

    public interface AppInterface
extends ErrorHandlerInterface, LoggerInterface, FormatInterface, PermissionInterface, VersionInterface, LanguageHandlerInterface, ConnectionHandlerInterface, MessageHandlerInterface
